nodes.text: Aurek was a pupil of the Central Isopter religious group and was quoted speaking about death in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings concerning the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel. The pupil's name was shared with that of a letter in the Aurebesh alphabet.
Aurek was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
